description:
An exhibition of Munch`s work is being held at the Suzuki Museum. Munch`s "Despair" and "Anxiety" are delivered to Narita Airport and packed by shipping company president Shimamura and his employees. Later, the truck transporting "Despair" and "Anxiety" depart for the Suzuki Museum, with the limousine carrying Conan, Ran, and Jirokichi following close behind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Cri de Munch a disparu !
